question: Can my wife do an abortion as my daughter is still small?
answer:
QUESTION

Dear Mufti Sahab, I've a baby girl of eight months Al-Hamdulillah. Now, my wife is again pregnant (first month of pregnancy).  I want to ask a question here; is there any permissibility to abort this pregnancy due to any of the following reasons?

1- The existing baby girl  is still smaller & needs full attention.
2- We are living in USA alone & we don't have any relatives here to assist us especailly the mother.
3- My wife is of age 22 & I'm afraid that she could handle two samller babies at the same time.

What is your suggestion according to Shari'ah? We are still confused & both of us like to stick with the Shari'ah rules. Al-Hamdulillah we don't have any financial problem except those I discussed earlier. Please suggest us what should we do in this situation.



ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh.

It is not permissible to abort the pregnancy based on any one or all the three reasons cited in your query.

Inshallah, Allah will grant you all the strength and courage to nurture both the children.

And Allah knows best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
